item.description:
Let's check out the Peter Max exhibit, then stroll to see the other Galleries on the Hill. Then we could have a bite to eat on Federal Hill, maybe go dancing???
We can meet in Cumberland, RI at 3:00 and carpool, or meet at the Peck Gallery at 4:00pm.


As one of America?s most famous artists, PETER MAX is a pop culture icon. His dynamic appeal, like George Gershwin, Charlie Chaplin, Walt Disney and Bob
Dylan, has spanned all demographics for several generations. With
over sixty record-breaking one-man museum exhibitions to his credit,
PETER MAX will be exhibiting his new creations at the Gallery 17 Peck
at 303 Atwells Avenue, Providence, RI as a part of the GALLERY NIGHT
PROVIDENCE 2010 beginning August 19, 2010 through August 29, 2010.
Open to the public Sat. Aug. 28 - 10 am to 5pm or 6 to 9pm
item.name: Peter Max Art Exhibit
